includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: A painkiller-addicted ER nurse (Edie Falco) struggles to balance the different chaotic aspects of her life.

includedAssets.title: Sweet 'N All
includedAssets.synopsis: Jackie and her husband become concerned about their daughter's anxiety. Plus, the hospital administrator accidentally drinks Jackie's coffee.

includedAssets.title: Daffodil

includedAssets.title: Season 1

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: In the third season of the acclaimed comedy drama, Jackie tries to recover from the exposure of her addiction, as well as struggling with the arrival of Kevin's sister Tunie.

includedAssets.title: Season 7
includedAssets.synopsis: The hospital faces closure and Jackie faces crunch time – could this be the end for Nurse Peyton and All Saints? The Emmy Award-winning Edie Falco returns as troubled nurse Jackie Peyton in the final season of the comedy drama.
